sprint_plan.title: Implement User Signup with Email/Password
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints and frontend components for user registration using email and password. Include input validation and secure password hashing.

sprint_plan.title: Implement User Login with Email/Password
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints and frontend components for user login using email and password. Implement JWT token generation upon successful authentication.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Google Sign-In Integration
sprint_plan.description: Integrate Google OAuth 2.0 for user signup and login. This involves backend setup for OAuth flow and frontend components for the Google Sign-In button.

sprint_plan.title: Develop User Profile Creation and Management UI
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for users to set up and manage their profile information (name, age, avatar).

sprint_plan.title: Develop Backend API for User Profile Management
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend API endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting user profile information, including avatar upload to AWS S3.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Parent Control for Child Account Permissions
sprint_plan.description: Design and implement backend logic and API endpoints to manage permissions and access for child accounts, linking them to parent accounts.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Parent Control of Child Permissions
sprint_plan.description: Create frontend components for parents to view and manage permissions for their child accounts.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Shared Family Calendar - Add Event API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoint for adding new events to the shared family calendar. Ensure real-time updates via WebSockets.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Shared Family Calendar - Edit Event API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoint for editing existing events in the shared family calendar. Ensure real-time updates via WebSockets.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Shared Family Calendar - Delete Event API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoint for deleting events from the shared family calendar. Ensure real-time updates via WebSockets.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Shared Family Calendar - Event Assignment API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend logic to support assigning events to specific family members.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Event Categorization with Color Coding
sprint_plan.description: Design and implement database schema and backend APIs for custom event categories with color coding. Ensure real-time updates.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Calendar UI with Daily, Weekly, Monthly Views
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for displaying the family calendar in daily, weekly, and monthly views. Integrate with Redux Toolkit for state management.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Real-time Calendar Updates using WebSockets
sprint_plan.description: Integrate Socket.IO on both frontend and backend to ensure real-time synchronization of calendar events between shared parent accounts.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Recurring Schedule Creation API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API to handle the creation of recurring events (daily, weekly, monthly) with specified end dates or indefinite recurrence.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Recurring Schedule Editing API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API to allow editing of individual instances or all future occurrences of recurring events.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Recurring Schedule Setup
sprint_plan.description: Create frontend components for users to define recurrence rules, end dates, and other options when creating or editing events.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Task Creation and Assignment API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for parents to create tasks, add descriptions, and assign them to specific children.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Task Viewing and Completion API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for children to view their assigned tasks and mark them as completed. Include parent view for completed tasks.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Task Management (Parent and Child Views)
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for parents to create/assign tasks and for children to view and mark tasks as complete.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Task Point Assignment API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API to allow parents to assign point values to tasks.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Reward Definition and Point Cost API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for parents to define rewards and their associated point costs.

sprint_plan.title: Implement User Point Balance Tracking
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend logic to track and update user point balances when tasks are completed and rewards are redeemed.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Reward Redemption API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for children to browse rewards, redeem them, and deduct points. Include optional approval workflow.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Gamified Rewards System
sprint_plan.description: Create engaging React Native components for children to view points, browse rewards, and redeem them. Also, parent UI for reward setup and approval.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Google Calendar Import API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API to handle the import of events from a connected Google Calendar into FamilyFlow.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Google Calendar Export API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API to handle the export of events from FamilyFlow to a connected Google Calendar.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Real-time Google Calendar Synchronization Logic
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend services to synchronize events between FamilyFlow and Google Calendar in near real-time.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Google Calendar Connection and Sync Settings
sprint_plan.description: Create frontend components for users to connect their Google account and configure calendar synchronization preferences.

sprint_plan.title: Add Notes and Location Fields to Event API
sprint_plan.description: Modify backend API endpoints for events to include fields for notes and location. Ensure data is saved and retrieved correctly.

sprint_plan.title: Update Calendar UI to Display Notes and Location
sprint_plan.description: Enhance React Native components for event viewing to display the added notes and location information.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Parental Dashboard API
sprint_plan.description: Create backend API endpoints to fetch aggregated data for the parental dashboard: upcoming events, pending tasks, and points summary.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Parental Dashboard UI
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for the parent dashboard, displaying summaries of events, tasks, and points.

sprint_plan.title: Implement 21-Day Routine Builder Backend Logic
sprint_plan.description: Design and implement backend logic and database schema for the 21-Day Routine Builder, including progress tracking.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for 21-Day Routine Builder
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for the 21-Day Routine Builder, allowing setup, visualization of progress, and marking of completed days.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Co-Parent Invitation and Connection API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for a parent to invite another parent and for the invited parent to accept the invitation, establishing a shared family account.

sprint_plan.title: Update Real-time Sync for Co-Parent Access
sprint_plan.description: Ensure that all real-time updates (calendar, tasks) are correctly broadcast and received by all connected parents in a family.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Co-Parent Invitation and Management
sprint_plan.description: Create frontend components for managing co-parent invitations and displaying connected family members.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Notification Service - Event Reminders
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend logic for the Notification Service to send push notifications for upcoming events.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Notification Service - Task Reminders
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend logic for the Notification Service to send push notifications for newly assigned tasks and upcoming deadlines.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Frontend Notification Handling
sprint_plan.description: Implement React Native components and Redux logic to receive and display push notifications. Include notification preference management.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Custom Event Category Management API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for parents to create, view, update, and delete custom event categories with associated colors.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Custom Task Category Management API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for parents to create, view, update, and delete custom task categories.

sprint_plan.title: Update Event and Task Forms to Use Custom Categories
sprint_plan.description: Modify frontend components for creating/editing events and tasks to allow selection from custom categories.

sprint_plan.title: Implement In-App Messaging API (Parent-to-Child)
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API endpoints for parents to send and children to receive messages associated with their profiles.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for In-App Messaging
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for parents to send messages and for children to view messages from their parent.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Advanced Reward Customization - Manual Approval API
sprint_plan.description: Extend backend logic and API for rewards to support a manual approval status for redemptions.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Advanced Reward Customization - Manual Grant API
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend API for parents to manually grant rewards that are not tied to point costs.

sprint_plan.title: Update UI for Advanced Reward Options
sprint_plan.description: Enhance frontend components for reward management to include options for manual approval and manual granting.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Backend API for Advanced Family Analytics
sprint_plan.description: Create backend API endpoints to aggregate and provide data for detailed analytics reports (time allocation, task trends, reward spending).

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Advanced Family Analytics Dashboard
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for the analytics section, visualizing reports for premium users.

sprint_plan.title: Integrate Payment Gateway API (e.g., Stripe)
sprint_plan.description: Integrate with a chosen payment gateway for processing subscription payments. Set up webhooks for payment status updates.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Subscription Management Logic
sprint_plan.description: Develop backend logic to manage subscription plans, track subscription status, and apply premium features based on subscription status.

sprint_plan.title: Develop UI for Subscription Plans and Payment
sprint_plan.description: Create React Native components for users to view subscription plans, initiate payments, and manage their subscription.

sprint_plan.title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline for New Features
sprint_plan.description: Configure GitHub Actions to automate testing, building, and deployment for the new features implemented in this sprint.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Unit and Integration Tests
sprint_plan.description: Write comprehensive unit and integration tests for all new backend API endpoints and critical frontend components using Jest and React Testing Library.

sprint_plan.title: Implement End-to-End Tests
sprint_plan.description: Write end-to-end tests using Cypress to cover key user flows, ensuring seamless integration of the new features.
